body.name: Fiwecos Perfume Travel Refillable Bottle Cologne Portable Atomizer Fragrance Scent Sprayer Pump Fill from Bottom Mini Pocket Size 5ml for Travel Essentials & Best Gift (Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 53 mins
features: 【TRAVEL MINI SIZE】 5ml portable atomizer, like lipstick size, lightweight and durable aluminum material makes it ideal for placing in your pocket or handbag, travel must haves, TSA approved for carry on baggage, let you always be surrounded by fragrance.

【100% NONE LEAKAGE】- Perfume subpackage, no leakage is the key. The key to no leakage lies in the CORE: exclusive patented sealing technology, using eco-friendly pure copper valves, multi-layer sealing, no contact with air, no leakage and no volatilization. Solves the leakage problem of the most products on the market.

【BOTTOM PUMP TO REFILL】- True bottom direct-fill integrated design, no need funnel or dropper, no need to remove the lid, make refill more convenient, quickly refill perfume in 5s, easy and enjoyable your trip!

【FITS 98% OF PERFUME BOTTLE NOZZLES】- The package with two adapters which suitable for most perfume sprinklers in the current market, you can use them on your perfume bottle nozzle to efficiently fill the atomizer without any leaks or waste of perfume.

【FINE ATOMIZATION】: The same spray nozzle of famous brand, nano atomization, fine and smooth, no water droplets, like a breeze on the face. Can save 40% perfume for you, 5ml can spray 60-80 times, last for 7-10days, and the spray nozzle is high quality, can use 6000-8000 times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Stocking Stuffer!
reviews.reviewText: Last year my fiancé and I went to Jamaica and he wasn’t sure on how to transport his cologne. I knew I had to find something for this years vacation and this worked out perfect. He loaded it up and just like that.. easy peasy. Used it on our trip this year and it worked just fine. No leakage either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and useful
reviews.reviewText: Looks quite luxe - holds a fair amount of spray (been using 2-3x daily for 3 weeks) - fine mist with broad spray angle (watch you face)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very good
reviews.reviewText: My son has cologne and was hesitant to bring it to school because it might break, this tool helped not damage his cologne and also it is very easy to move the cologne from the bottle to this little tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i love the simple design and ease of refilling the reservoir. the gold container really sticks out amongst my cheap plastic travel-sized & refillable containers, and makes me wish there was a complete travel set for cosmetics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We travel a lot and sometimes we got on short trips where we prefer to use only carry-ons. This is a must so you can bring your favorite cologne or perfume with you.I got the black one for my husband and it looks masculine and elevated. I mean I love me some black and gold accessories so it can totally be female. It just looks expensive and stylish!It was really easy to fill and again I really dig the style. My favorite color is green so I might get the green for myself! I included some photos of what it looks like without the casting so you can see how easily you can fill. Overall, 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight atomizer, had a little trouble with leaking
reviews.reviewText: Nice little atomizer for purse. This is not the first I’ve had, so have experience filling them, but this one did leak just a little, as the nozzle did not want to seat perfectly. However, it’s light, sturdy, and is perfect for travel. Holds a good amount of perfume, at least a few days, depending on how much you use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super handy hack
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a few brands of these atomizers and they are fairly similar but this one stands a bit above. It's very visually appealing and did not leak from the top sprayer (an issue I have somehow had with another brand). It's not foolproof to get the perfume in without a few little accidental misplaced sprays but essentially you can fill the portable atomizer with a minute or two of pumping actions between the original and travel bottles.Note that you cannot open the top to simply pour the perfume in. You have to pump it from atomizer mouth to atomizer mouth. They do include two alternative adapters, in case you have a non-traditional atomizer on your source bottle of perfume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little product perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: A friend had given me a similar product a long time ago that got my hopes up but then leaked in my suitcase (at least it smelled good...). I got this one to replace it and so far I am very pleased.It was nicely packed and the instructions were on the box. I opened it, took it apart and put some perfume in it quickly and easily. The parts fit together well and look like they would contain a leak if it ever happened (a selling point in my book, although I am not expecting this one to leak). It took five pumps to put the amount in it you see in the picture. I will not use the labels, but it was a nice touch to have them included. I didn't need an adapter for my perfume bottle, but they are included just in case.The atomizer sprayed strongly, but with a little finesse can be controlled for smaller amounts. The bottle looks like it would hold enough to last me quite a while (or maybe be a one-time use for the guy next to me at the pizza place last Wednesday, geez). Two thumbs up! :)
